授業目的:
The
 purpose of this course is for students to improve upon their current 
speaking and listening skills according to individual abilities.
到達目標: Students will be able to:1.    comprehend a variety of spoken dialog.2.    engage in a wide variety of speaking situations.3.    discern between different speaking styles.4.    prepare a debate on a topical issue.5.    deliver a public speech by way of researched presentation.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1: The class will focus on topics in the textbook with additional supplementary materials.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour for homework each week.

教科書/Required texts0: World Link Third Edition Book 3, Authors: Nancy Douglas, James R. Morgan, Susan Stempleski, Publisher: Cengage.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Mid-term Exam 20, Final Exam 20, Weekly Wreiting Jouranl 20, writing assingments, homework, quizzes and presentations 40.
